title: Neverwinter.Nights.2.Mysteries.Of.Westgate-CPY
description:
CPY release, I'm only uploading.


-INSTRUCTIONS-

1. Install Neverwinter Nights 2 using this serial number:
   
     KKUKU-E7PHH-FTUU6-AMQRA-G4P7G-VQVRL-XUGFX
   
   (If you already have NWN2 installed, edit the nwncdkey.ini file in the game
    folder, and change the Key1 to the above key.)

2. Mount the .cue file included in this torrent, and install Mysteries of Westgate
   using this serial number during installation:

     16WGA-ZVHW7-B71GZ-D4320-55ZKM-XK0D0-CBENX

3. Start a new campaign and choose Mysteries of Westgate. The module should
   unpack and the intro movie should start playing. If this doesn't happen, check
   your internet connection.

After successfully starting MoW once, the module is validated and you no longer need an internet connection to play.

Note:
You can freely install Mask of the Betrayer and Storm of Zehir, they have no influence on Mysteries of Westgate.
